program.name: w3m
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CPP="/usr/lib/cpp" CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b,"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--disable-ipv6 --disable-mouse" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -c99 \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--disable-ipv6 --disable-mouse" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-R"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-R"
ARGS="--disable-mouse" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CPP=${CPP+${CPP}} CC="${CC:-gcc}" \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" CPPFLAGS="\ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}/ncurses} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-I${SB_VAR_LIBZ_INC}}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-L${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+-L${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}} -L${SB_VAR_LIBGC_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBGC_LIB} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --with-termlib=ncurses --datadir=${_datadir} \ --sysconfdir=${_sysconfdir} \ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+--with-libintl-prefix=${SB_VAR_GETTEXT}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+--with-libiconv-prefix=${SB_VAR_LIBICONV}} \ --disable-xface --disable-nntp --enable-image=no \ --enable-gopher --with-gc=${SB_VAR_LIBGC} \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_sysconfdir} ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/mailcap ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/mime.types ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 /dev/null \ ${_sysconfdir}/urimethodmap

item.para: new option to fontify <del>, <s>, <ins>, and so on
"\n" handling in attributes' values of HTML tags
Remove support for AIX 4.3, SLES 10, RHEL 3, Solaris 6 and 7
Add compiler optimisation flags for RHEL 3

Apply patch for CVE-2010-2074 (http://www.cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2010-2074). istream.c in w3m, when ssl_verify_server is enabled, does not properly handle a '\0' character in a domain name in the (1) subject's Common Name or (2) Subject Alternative Name field of an X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof arbitrary SSL servers via a crafted certificate issued by a legitimate Certification Authority, a related issue to CVE-2009-2408.
Apply Fedora patch to disable SSLv2 and verify SSL certificates by default
